website_summaries.verdict: They’re not Oakleys, but they perform well and are a fantastic deal.
pros: A great choice for a variety of sports
cons: Tends to fog slightly during heavy perspiration

customer_reviews.title: They are wonderful glasses, except
customer_reviews.text: They are wonderful glasses, except... they do scratch easily, which you kind of expect for plastic. But the deal-killer is that the nose guards fall off. I've bought EIGHT pairs, and every time, the rubber nose guards fall off the two little plastic posts that are supposed to hold them in place. Then you have to buy another pair. I finally contact them, and they (ta da!) offered me 10% off the next pair i'd buy another. Look for something else!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were really great sunglasses because the company backed them with a warranty. The problem was when I bent down to to pick up a ball on a plush field of soft grass the lenses got scratched. The frames might hold up but I have had cheaper sunglasses whose lenses are much more scratch resistant. I wrote the company for I only had them for two months and they gave me the "automatic" response of lenses are not covered. I would NEVER buy or recommend these sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Mary says it truthfully

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but the rubber sucks.
customer_reviews.text: To these are really comfortable. I can wear them all day driving and almost never know they're there. My biggest issue with them is the rubber. The nose piece fell apart. I contacted the company and they do sell it make replacements for them. I still wear them occasionally and now the rubber on the rest of the frames is disintegrating. These are cheap, they come with a lifetime warranty but that warranty only covers the frames if they break. You get what you pay for with these. I did contact the company and they apologized and gave me a discount code to order more from their website. No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Wilber

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The product is comfortable except for the large, perforated, hard rubber nose pads that left a large impression. I have hard a very hard time finding ladies’ wrap sunglasses. They pass the test I would recommend. The four stars rating was because of the nose pads. Other than that issue, would have been rated five stars. Received overnight and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: i lost my sunglasses on a recent cruise and couldn't wait to get home and reorder another pair. they are very lightweight and extremely comfortable to wear. the lense color i wanted arrive just the way i had ordered. they are designed to completely block out the sun and are really good for driving on a bright sunny day. you won't go wrong buying a pair for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: ed k.

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not great, but not bad either.
customer_reviews.text: Its just ok, not great but not bad either. I wish the lenses were a bit darker. After 6 months, one of the nose cushions tore loose, a comment posted by others too. I have asked the seller for a replacement but they have not yet responded. Fortunately, with both nose cushions removed (they are a 1 piece injection molded integrated into the frame), the glasses still work ok.
customer_reviews.author: Franz Hofmann

customer_reviews.title: i wear these all the time, ill definitely buy another pair
customer_reviews.text: i love these sunglasses, they have become my go to pair. i own lots of sunglasses but these are great, they have now even replaced my driving glasses. They fit practically perfectly snug around the head without squeezing at all. ive run around playing frisbee and volleyball with these and had no problems with them falling off like many do... so everything else like golf and fishing arent an issue at all. as far as 'unbreakable' goes... well i wont be testing that claim with my own pair, but if you guys want to send me some I'd be happy to put together a stress test video to add to this review.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Joseph Bell

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I've never liked wearing glasses for sports due to obstructed view, discomfort, clarity, etc., but I know I need some protection from the sun. So I tried these after reading good reviews and after my first round with these I am very pleased. I got the brown to maximize contrast on the course and I think they worked perfectly. They're light, cover the eyes well, did not obscure my view at all, and felt like they weren't even there. Here in Atlanta with all the crud in the Spring air I think they will also help keep that out as well. For $35 I am quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Chasm

customer_reviews.title: Practical but could be higher quality lens & frame for the price
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are large and fit my face fairly well. As described, they are good for activities where you want to completely block the sun. The lens covers my entire face and the frames are tight. I would give another star if the frames were of higher quality. The pictures make the platic look more metallic than they are. The design around the nose can be aesthetically improved. Lastly, the price can be lower, albeit this brand is already far cheaper than the glasses produced by Luxottica (Google Luxottica 60 minutes to learn more about glasses industry). It cost a few dollars to produce these glasses and without any special polarized lens $30 is not justified.
customer_reviews.author: M6

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Sunglasses... I was really nervous at first, but they fit great and I love them. Great Deal. After just a few months the plastic nose guard came out of the plastic frame. Almost impossible to get it back in, but I figured out how to get it in with a pair of tweezers working it back in. It popped out the next week. I'm still giving this a 5 since I don't think my pair should limit the rating of these glasses... however, If I had to make a change to this it would be for the manufacturer to glue the nose guard in better.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Storiale

customer_reviews.title: Easy Returns
customer_reviews.text: Product returned. Nose piece is definately of low quality. These glasses are not for anyone wanting quality, comfortable glasses. I guess you get what you pay for. Peripheral vision is ideal for golfing. One of the lenses was not completely in the frame and the frame had a noticible tilt. Returned and bought the Tifosi Tyrant 2.0. The Tifosi's are much higher quality, but this model was too narrow. Now trying the Tifosi Slip Wrap with fingers crossed. Return process was great so worth of shot if you want to save money on sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Yeti

customer_reviews.title: Some other sunglasses seem to be far away from my face and feel like they might fall off but not these
customer_reviews.text: First of all, these fit me very well on my face. Some other sunglasses seem to be far away from my face and feel like they might fall off but not these. The best part of JiMarti is their customer service - it is absolutely top notch. They responded to my question over the weekend and when I wished to purchase replacement lens due to scratching, they simply went ahead and shipped me a brand new pair free of charge. These guys stand by their products and I won't hesitate to buy my next pair from them. Thanks again for your awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you want to shoot your best game ever...
customer_reviews.text: Wore these sunglasses on the golf course for the first time last Monday. I shot my best game ever. I don't necessarily attribute my success to the glasses, but they certainly didn't hurt my game and my eyes were protected from the harmful rays of the sun. I also liked the copper tint as it helped in seeing the ball more clearly. Needless to say.... I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Tejaspro

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for golf, could be better
customer_reviews.text: Decent sunglasses - I bought the brown lens style to use for golf. They are somewhat stylish, but they don't cover my full field of view when I'm wearing them. I can still see a bit outside of the glasses on the bottom when I'm lining up for my shot, which is a bit distracting. Very comfortable and lightweight, but I just wish they covered more so that I couldn't see anything outside of them.
customer_reviews.author: Yhea

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these "unbreakable" glasses to use at the shooting range, figuring the Amber lenses would help reduce glare (like my Serengeti Drivers). While these aren't quite on that level, nor should they be for 1/5th the cost, the did an adequate job. For now, they'll stay in my range bag, along with a basic, clear-lens pair. Rated four stars because my head hurt more than usual after an hour of shooting. This is probably related to the ear pieces (which are longer than those found on range-specific glasses) being compressed by the hearing protection. So for those of you who are going to wear these as everyday sunglasses, I doubt you'd have the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Solid value
customer_reviews.text: For $27 these are terrific glasses. I use them for cycling and like how they wrap around my face eliminating much more glare than regular street sunglasses. They're also very light and stay perched on the bridge of my nose, meaning I stop noticing them altogether, including not having to adjust them as I sweat. (The little rubber piece that keeps these glasses perched was distracting at first but I stopped noticing it after one ride.) They also look good with my helmet and I matched the colors to boot. I would not wear these beyond cycling though, but only because they look to cyborgy for me.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sunglasses, the lenses is so well made that every other sunglasses lenses look like cheap 1$ sunglasses compare to this, everything looks so clear and this is the only sunglasses that I found not causes eyes fatigue, I have tried flying fisherman, Duco Sunglasses,... but I never satisfied with them. The design isn't really good looking, but it totally wrap around your head and no dusts can move into your eyes. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Minh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Buy the JMP01 Instead
customer_reviews.text: I really like the JiMarti sunglasses and have bought them for years as they are more scratch resistant than others for the price. Just a note to others that the JMP01 that are very similar might be $5 more but the frame is much better in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: concerned

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not "unbreakable"
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I am purchasing these glasses as I liked the first pair. They stay put on my head and do a good job at keeping the sun out of my eyes. The first pair held up pretty good, but were partially broken when I was hugging a friend while they were hanging from the neck line on my t-shirt. We were celebrating a touchdown at a football game and part of the plastic that holds the point where the hinge is broke. They still held together and worked for another year or two after the "incident", but I lost them a month ago. So, while they aren't unbreakable, they did survive breaking fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: Dave P

customer_reviews.title: Certainly good sunglasses for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Certainly good sunglasses for the cost! The plastic looks a little cheap but is very lite and the glasses do fit tightly around your head and will not fall off. I believe that the piece which fits above your nose is actually better made than the ones on some of my more expensive sunglasses. However, that piece is also more rigid with less flexibility, so if you like a more "springy" feel, this may not suit you. I will hopefully not have to test out the JiMarti "Liftetime Guarantee," but it certainly sounds like a great deal if it is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Birdsong

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, good finish
customer_reviews.text: My matte frame and brown lens pair fit well and had great quality lenses. They were a joy to look though and the tint worked well even indoors. They are extremely curved for great wind and side protection, but in the end I needed darker lenses. I may try a mirror pair later
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small-ish head (even for a woman) and I often have trouble finding hats and glasses that don't slide around. These glasses fit wonderfully! I'm from Florida so heat and humidity are the norm. Wore them for the first time in 90-plus degree heat with horrible humidity on a 20-mile ride and they didn't slide once. Nor did they fog up. I was so comfortable in them, I actually forgot that they were on. They've got kind of a futuristic look about them, which is new for me. I liked them so much, I'm going to try wearing them to the beach, since I can't ever get my sunglasses to stay on comfortably at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: MovieLover

customer_reviews.title: nice fit, but there was no case included in ...
customer_reviews.text: nice fit, but there was no case included in the item. sunglass was placed in a resealable plastic. i find it hard to buy a casing since its a sports sunglasses and a bit bulky for a standard eyeglass casing. would have been great if the product comes in its own case
customer_reviews.author: Weezerrye

customer_reviews.title: Unbreakable, but definitely not unscratchable
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I got these glasses they felt super light, kinda flimsy - nothing solid or strong like the other glasses I buy. But unbreakable they might be. I went on my first bike ride with them - had good optical clarity and it blocked the wind quite well. It worked well for that purposes. When I nitpick though, the center nose things block my vision in the middle slightly and the lenses scratch a bit too easily for my taste. I don't even recall putting them down! So I have to say they're okay for what you pay for, but if you want something more solid and long-lasting, I'd go somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Feels great great sun block glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses, light weight but still strong. Easy on and off with one hand without the worry of breaking . Worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Bayles

customer_reviews.title: these will be perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing glasses with polarized lenses for years. Thought these might suffice for a second/back-up set. For me these glasses do not work well at all because of the very lightly tinted lens as well as their fitment. The lens is not very big, too much light coming in from below the lens and the sides do not wrap around as much as they appear to. For someone with a relatively small face, that doesnt want polarized lenses, these will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: M. Main

customer_reviews.title: Unbreakable
customer_reviews.text: It is advertised as an "Unbreakable frame" The material seems very firm and not very flexible which suggests that if I twist it it would break. I guess I can't try it see whether it would break or not. Other than that it feels great when I wore it for the first time. The advertised picture emphasizes a blue almost transparent lens, but it didn't appear that way when I received it but appears blue in the bright sunlight. My best review would probably be after I have worn it and had a few crashes (which I hope will never happen) So far though, I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Storeboy

customer_reviews.title: good performance but doesn't look appealing
customer_reviews.text: In terms of quality this is a good glass. But the looks aren't great. The plastic looks low quality and the overall shape of the lens being slanted upward is not pleasing. But my friend really loved it. The polarizing lens cuts all glare and gives clear and sharp rendering. It covers the eyes from most sides against uv. I didn't test whether it is unbreakable but know that in terms of performance this is a really good glass.
customer_reviews.author: awared

customer_reviews.title: OK sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Purchased just over a year ago. Although nice glasses they do not hold up as well as expected based on product information. They get used all the time and have noticed they scratch fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: DRC

customer_reviews.title: Truly Unbreakable
customer_reviews.text: I like the style of these shades. A lot of other cheap sunglasses don't look as nice on your face, don't fit as comfortably, or let too much light in from the sides of the sunglasses. These fit perfectly and block out the sun really well without making it hard to see. I've taken these sunglasses with me when I travel. I've never used a case. They've been stepped on, sat on, tossed into a backpack that gets thrown around, and they've survived everything I've put them through.
customer_reviews.author: D. Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: I researched best inexpensive sunglasses since I am constantly losing glasses and don't want to keep losing expensive one. JiMarti came up as one of the results and I ordered them. Excellent value! UV protection, polycarbonate for impact protection, and good styling. If they sold them in a 3-pack I would buy that too! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Floridian

customer_reviews.title: I see the light
customer_reviews.text: These are great sunglasses for the price. Fit well, stays in place while running. They squeak a little when you put them on but no biggie. On the down side, I did scratch up the inside real bad. Luckily I bought two pairs so I can still see the light. By the way, I got the Novus 1,2, and 3 polish system. It takes time and patience but the damaged pair is now almost like new. The polishing took of the inner tint but it's not noticeable when you wear the glasses. The deepest scratch is barely noticeable and one day when I have more time, I'll go at it again with the three polishes to get them out.
customer_reviews.author: Divot_Master

customer_reviews.title: The view is like not wearing sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glasses for golf. I was having difficulty following the golf ball down the fairway, couldn't figure out why. I started reading, and one of the recommendations was another pair of sunglasses. Wow! These sunglasses made an immediate and huge difference. Instead of looking in to a black and white world, I can now see in high contrast. The view is like not wearing sunglasses, more like a late afternoon sun at your back with no sunglasses. I can now follow the golf ball ball 200+ yards down the fairway with relative ease. They are also very comfortable, and I have started to wear them for driving. Just all around great glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Parra

customer_reviews.title: I love the glasses but the rubber nose piece tore completely ...
customer_reviews.text: waited to review glasses after having for a while. I love the glasses but the rubber nose piece tore completely off from normal wear.They have lifetime warranty and are supposedly unbreakable...Contacted for new replacement nose piece,but thats not covered. Trash they go!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and durable
customer_reviews.text: Everything I'm looking for in sunglasses. The lenses are wide to block sun from the side and angle downward, which prevents light from coming in from the bottom. The padding at the bridge is designed to stay put, unlike many sunglasses. Most sunglasses are too small for my husband and these were no exception, but they are so flexible that he says that they are still very comfortable. They are his favorite sunglasses, for this reason. Also, they are made of a very lightweight, flexible material.
customer_reviews.author: Warfy

customer_reviews.title: These feel light and very comfortable and the color gives me a good view and ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed sunglasses for my golfing. Have had several makes and shades in the past. These feel light and very comfortable and the color gives me a good view and surface relief. Bought these in part because of good reviews in several of my search avenues.
customer_reviews.author: richard bell

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and perfect for sports
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing more annoying than having to adjust your sunglasses frequently during a run. Well, I found the solution; these JiMarti sunglasses are lightweight, fit snugly (do not slip AT ALL), are very comfortable, and provide very good protection from the glaring sun. On top of everything else, they look rather sharp! Considering how great this pair of shades is, the price is unbelievably competitive. Not having purchasing JiMarti sunglasses previously, the product turned out to be far better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. T

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I ever made.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this regularly ever since I bought it - I can't say how much I like it. It looks great, it's light, durable from what I can tell, and blocks unwanted light/UV, etc. real well. My eyes don't feel well in certain kind of sunlight, or if they're just strong, but with this, my eyes feel good and can have them open widely as I would like them to! The only drawback? Wearing it regularly makes the skin around my eyes lighter than the rest of my face. Oh well!
customer_reviews.author: Ain't Nobody Got Time to Review

customer_reviews.title: They are not Oakley's, but they are relatively inexpensive and durable and look good
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this brand several times... they are reasonably priced and pretty durable. I am satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Confetti Heart

customer_reviews.title: Works as described!! Fits good and hasn't broken!
customer_reviews.text: Works as described!! Fits good and hasn't broken! This is a key for me because when I'm not wearing my shades, after coming indoors, I like to store them on top of my head. Given that that part of our heads is wider than the area of our eyes, these shades flex to the wider position and do not break or crack, as described.
customer_reviews.author: DWO23800

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for Low Cost
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these sunglasses for biking primarily based on the overwhelming number of great reviews. I haven't dropped these or run over them with a steam roller to test the warranty that everyone is raving about. I can say that the initial feel of the glasses is somewhat cheap but after using them for a while I don't anticipate these breaking anytime soon. The lenses are much higher quality than most sun glasses I've had in this price range. They do a good job filtering light while maintaining a good color balance and increasing contrast.
customer_reviews.author: Sure Deals

customer_reviews.title: Great and affordable sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses get the job done well. I've used them for running, walking and jogging and they stay in place on my face. This is very important for me as it's very annoying to jog and constantly have to refit your sunglasses. They are lightweight, well made and look good. I went with the Silver and Blue Ice. They definitely look like sports sunglasses so you'll have a hard time going to a funeral with them and avoiding being stared at :-). They are inexpensive enough for me not to care if I ever break or loose them. For this price point, you cannot go wrong with this product!
customer_reviews.author: A. Carballo

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive active sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very hard on sunglasses as I do a lot of outdoor activities (mainly mountain bike riding) and tend to get them sweaty, dirty, drop them, etc. So far I've had these for a month and don't see any scratches or flaking of the coating. I've bought other sunglasses in this price range (and even more) and had them become unusable (too damaged to see through safely) after this period of time. By the way, these are NOT polarized but I prefer non-polarized for bike riding as they sometimes make computers, watches, heart-rate monitors, etc. hard to read.
customer_reviews.author: FL Mtb Rider

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service - Broken Glasses Immediately Replaced 1 1/2 Years After Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in October 2013. In April 2015 they snapped in my hand while I was hanging up a jacket in our closet. Very odd. I was frustrated and immediately sent an email to JiMarti expressing my frustration. Within a week JiMarti had sent me a new pair at no cost. I was very impressed with the customer service. I was disappointed the glasses broke with so little pressure on the frame. Obviously, the frame is not unbreakable. However, the glasses do fit well, are light and are very comfortable. I would buy JiMarti glasses again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with my purchase. These are impact resistant and have saved my eyes a few time while cycling and running. Wore these fishing on the boat and kept the salt spray out of my eyes, but they are not polarized, so not the best for super bright days. This color lens doesn't seem to reduce the amount of sunlight very much - maybe 15-20%, was hoping for something a bit darker. They weigh nearly nothing, fit comfortably, and are tough: for the price I think they are pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I probably have 5 or 6 pair of sunglasses laying around. And that's cause these are great. No squinting when driving into sun. Hell sometimes I have to take them off, they cover you're while eye. No sun coming under it from sides. And s*** for the price you can't beat them. They haven't got a scratch on them, and that's cause I put then in a case or anything the beat thing I do for them is wipe the dirt off. I am deff going to get me atleast one more pair. Diff color tho gotta change it up a little
customer_reviews.author: Disligaf

customer_reviews.title: the sunglasses do a good job to protect eyes from sun light in outdoor activities
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband. He has a middle size face. The frame of this sunglasses is right fit for him, neither too tight nor too loose. But the glasses is too big because his face is not a long face. Overall its design is good for outdoor sport activities. It does a very good job to cover the eyes, protecting them from the sun light in all directions. The one I bought is Black & Smoke, I should point out that the real glasses are darker than what shown by the photos. But I still like this buy.
customer_reviews.author: HW4318

customer_reviews.title: These stand up to a lot of abuse. Five stars!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these. Every pair I’ve bought him has lasted a year or more. He leaves his sunglasses in the car a lot, and here in Florida, the sun makes plastic sunglasses brittle and they break easily. These last MUCH longer than any other brand he’s had. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: These worked great for that
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pair of glasses that wrapped all the way around and protected my eyes from the sun. These worked great for that. If there is any downside I can think of at all its that they don't fold flat and won't be as easily stored in your pocket or other glasses holders that have flatter models in mind, and you will probably need to get the container if you want to carry these in a bag. Though from looking at them it should not be a surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: These are a great value. Fit
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value. Fit, finish and performance are excellent. I think you would be hard pressed to find a better pair for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to run in. I've used them a couple of times, and I am very pleased with how light weight they are and how confortably they fit. I don't even notice them as they don't move around on your nose. They are very adequate for the job and much more economical than the Oakleys, Bolles, or Icicles I've previously used. I figure the way I lose or misplace sunglasses or they become scratched or sat on, these are more than adequate for my needs and at a much better price than comparable glasses.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Good fit. Doesn't look too big for my face
customer_reviews.text: Good fit. Doesn't look too big for my face. It is a good tint for blocking out the sun without making everything too dark. My daughters love them for softball and I use them for golf and driving. Unfortunately, the lenses scratched too easily. All three pair got scratches after about 4 months. Need to see if the lifetime warranty is any good.
customer_reviews.author: Grover36

customer_reviews.title: Pretty meh.
customer_reviews.text: They get the job done, but they aren't great. They sit a bit weird on my face. Firstly, they are crooked (I wear corrective lenses every day, and they aren't crooked on me - I think it's the design of these). Also, the sides of the glasses tend to bend too far inward and rub up against my cheeks. It isn't uncomfortable, really, but it makes the lens steam up as I'm running. For the price, they do their job.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Hilburn

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, great hold... will buy agian
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses. They fit really well, they hold on to my face super well, and are plenty comfortable. If you are looking for glasses for sports (I use these for mountain biking) they will hold in place very well. They are not distorting even though they wrap around quite a bit. I think these are probably the best fitting pair of glasses I have ever owned... will buy again... and again...
customer_reviews.author: Peter Majerczak

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, durable, and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use on an adventure race. I'm not an expert, but I can tell you I notice very little distortion in the lenses and the tracking is great, even at far distances. They stay on my face when running, and the curved lenses/frame help them to shield out all UV light from reaching your eyes (contrast this with more stylish sunglasses, which look cool but can be rendered useless when the sun is very low or very high). They're also so lightweight that I almost forget they're there. Good price, too.
customer_reviews.author: AreCN

customer_reviews.title: Not a good option for golf
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glasses for golf given the non-polarized, bronze color was recommended for golf. Under varying sunlight conditions, I could not pick up the ball (white) off the tee. Otherwise, glasses fit well and I can use them as back-up to my raybans( Raybans are polarized and not good for eading greens...
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Seem good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: They fit very nicely and are comfortable when worn for a long period.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Happel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fit & Clear View
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Fit & Clear View! One of the best glasses i have every had! - The lens is very clear and has no scratches - Fits firmly and will not fall off - Rubber for the nose is comfortable - The lens is not loose. - I am going to buy other colors that they have with the same glasses in the future. - Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Rakul Raghavan

customer_reviews.title: ... separated out of its slot so they are supper annoying to try and wear/constantly correct - and I can't ...
customer_reviews.text: These were advertised as indestructible and guaranteed for life but the nose piece has already separated out of its slot so they are supper annoying to try and wear/constantly correct - and I can't find any way to return or exchange them. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: The Transformer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Having owned numerous oakley's I didn't have much expectations for these glasses but they have become my go-to pair. He amber lenses actually make the world brighter while at the same time reducing bright light. I have used these to Mt. Bike, shoot, drive and just everyday use. Glasses are light weight, comfortable and durable. I did pop a lense when I put them in the pocket of my swim suit diving into the water and can't get the lense to seat 100% all the time. I'll be buying a second pair and using these as a back-up.
customer_reviews.author: Coda Vex

customer_reviews.title: Verry poor look, I really don't know if the price ...
customer_reviews.text: Verry poor look, I really don't know if the price worth the very bad painting. Golf is a very classy game, sincerely I don't know how these will look in the green. Long story short, you better improve the painting quality because I wouldn't buy this again. On the positive side, the material of the frame is very light and looks durable.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H Taylor

customer_reviews.title: clear vision in any light condition
customer_reviews.text: i got this for cycling but they are so comfortable that i decided to use them for everything mainly for driving, here in florida is important to have the best sunglasses and these are the perfect ones.
customer_reviews.author: victor luna

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service was awesome. We bought them September and knew we needed ...
customer_reviews.text: Customer Service was awesome. We bought them September and knew we needed a pair of sunglasses that would last. My husband has been through a million pairs. They all scratch, break in half, nose piece disappears you name it. We chose these bcs they had a warranty. Here we are 10 months later and we reached out to the company because the lens were peeling. He asked for a picture and copy of invoice. With in hours we had a response and new sunglasses are on the way. Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Mamabear1219620

customer_reviews.title: Sporty and Classy
customer_reviews.text: I have a big head that fit perfectly got a lot of compliments sharp glasses
customer_reviews.author: Mustard Man

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but not great
customer_reviews.text: I got these and use them almost solely for driving. Unfortunately one of the lenses partly came loose when I was cleaning them with a microfiber cloth when they weren't more than a couple months old. I wasn't even using much pressure. My guess is maybe the glue came loose from sitting in the car. On a more positive note, the lenses themselves are a lot clearer than the cheapo sunglasses I usually get.
customer_reviews.author: JasonJ

customer_reviews.title: These glasses are great!
customer_reviews.text: I tend to buy a cheapo pair of sunglasses every year or so and always end up having to get a new pair when they break. I wanted to get a pair with a good warranty and great reviews that would last. I wasn't disappointed. These are VERY comfortable and stylish. The "nose rest" is much more comfortable than other pairs I've owned. My only beef is that the price dropped $5 within a day or two of buying them. Other than that, I really dig these!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Attention Getters
customer_reviews.text: I get comments about my cool glasses from people on a regular when I have these on. I like how they are made because the couple times I've sat on them the lens comes out and then it's easy to get back in after you figure it out. It has clipping areas yo have to line up is all. You'll see it if you have to. Buy them for anything less than $30 IMHO, good deal. Fly shades!
customer_reviews.author: BagBad, WhosYourDaddy, Byrd

customer_reviews.title: They do the trick for beach volleyball
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are great for playing beach volleyball in the sun all day. They have a very unique and comfortable padding for your nose, which keeps them secure for activity. Only negative was when I wanted to just wear them on top of my head to avoid getting a tan line, they didn't really stay up there and would slide off easily...but this is obviously just a minor thing and is probably different for every head-shape. Good glasses to get if you're looking for a new cheap but effective pair.
customer_reviews.author: Al Loha

customer_reviews.title: Would give these glasses six stars!
customer_reviews.text: These are great glasses. They are light, very comfortable, and compare well to glasses costing several times more. Additionally you cannot beat the customer service JiMarti provides. If I were to purchase another pair of sunglasses today it would be from JiMarti,
customer_reviews.author: D F MORRILL

customer_reviews.title: Nice sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sunglasses for my son. They were shipped promptly, and received in perfect/new condition. They fit very well, and my son looked great in them. The only issue was that my son wanted polarized lenses -- which these are not. My mistake. I'm returning them, but certainly not because there was anything wrong with them. My son works on the water and needs the polarized lenses. Oops.
customer_reviews.author: DanoB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sun protection
customer_reviews.text: I use these playing pickle ball outdoors. Just the right amount of sun protection without distorting vision. It is my second pair. I lost my first one and immediately ordered a second pair
customer_reviews.author: steven a wabnitz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ive never owned a pair of sunglasses. boy am i happy i have these for a first pair. u cannot feel these on ur face, everything is padded and they are light. as to if they are unbreakable frame, i have only had them for a month, but they do feel very sturdy vs the sun, they are great. i think i could look at the sun and it not hurt. a bonus, my girlfriend said they look hot
customer_reviews.author: cruzer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I go through sunglasses like crazy - they fall off when I'm doing outdoor activities, I sit on them in the car, I leave them in restaurants. These glasses are extremely comfortable, provide excellent protection from the sun (I love the wrap around lens) and they offer clarity when viewinh through the lens. The price is great too, so I do not break the bank in having to replace the ones I always seem to lose.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Newman, Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I had my last pair of sunglasses for 16 years. They were getting scratched and worn and I was having a hard time finding a replacement pair I liked. I thought I would try these - they're inexpensive so I wouldn't be losing too much if I didn't like them. They're great sunglasses: light-weight, good fit, the lenses are a nice color.
customer_reviews.author: Chris McNaught

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses, good fit
customer_reviews.text: I like these sunglasses very much. I am outside a lot, running, hiking, etc., and am pretty rough on sunglasses. Bought a pair a few years ago that got broken in an auto accident, but that's all that was broken, and it was a fairly bad accident. I tried others that are sold in grocery or drug stores, but they do not hold up at all. So far, so good with these. Worth the extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: E. Finley

customer_reviews.title: These are as good as my much more expensive sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I can't use polarized sunglass in the car as they block out the dashboard info. These are as good as my much more expensive sunglasses. My first pair suddenly fell apart after 4 months of use and were immediately replaced. I just had to send a photo and my invoice.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Wetcher

customer_reviews.title: Great... but not quite as invincible as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: They are hard as heck to break... but are breakable. And if you do... crickets will be heard from the company. Also, the lenses scratch fairly easily, sadly. However, still one of the best sunglasses I have ever had. About to buy more simply because I've abused them, and they have stood up to it fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: The Shades

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking, clear, & durable
customer_reviews.text: These fit comfortably, look cool and the lenses are very clear. They do a good job of cutting the glare. They are not as good as my old Oakleys but for $30 I think a good value. I saw some reviews that said the frames were cheap and flimsy. I can tell you that during a roller hockey game I took a slap shot square to my eye(playing with a ball not a puck) and the glasses were fine. No damage to any part of them at all and no damage to me.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: wife uses for running
customer_reviews.text: My wife lost her nike sport sunglasses (around $50) and got these to replace them. She uses them for running, and she likes them, though not as much as the nikes. These are bigger lenses and don't hug the face quite as much, but are lightweight, flexible, and comfortable. I recommend them for the price, as they are 1/2 the price of the nike skylons they replaced.
customer_reviews.author: A. Salerno

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glasses because I needed glasses to run a 5k but I didn't want to pay a fortune since I'm just getting started. My face is not wide so I usually have trouble finding glasses that fit me well. This pair not only fits well (I even received compliments!) but also stays in place while I run. The quality of the lens is very good. I did not expect that good of a quality for the price I paid so was pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.author: GrabMyWallet

customer_reviews.title: These things are great. They truly are unbreakable
customer_reviews.text: These things are great. They truly are unbreakable, I've had countless things bang into and smash down on them and no sign of breakage a year later. they do a good job of keeping the sun out of my eyes. I work in a greenhouse and the sun gets turned into a glare that is very annoying so these have been great for me
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Dzialo

customer_reviews.title: Great looking sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Look great but fit for me was not so good, one of the lenses were a little warped and kept hitting my face. After wearing for about a hour they would hurt behind the ears, tried to bend them out a little but would still go back into original shape. Shipping was great and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Viper79

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the sunglasses.
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses for outdoor activities. Offers additional clarity and allows me to better track my ball during its flight path. On the ground it's easy to distinguish the ball on the grass. JiMarti backs up their products with a lifetime guarantee. I already own 2 pairs of their sunglasses and I use them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: The lenses are great and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these sunglasses for years. They certainly stand up to the hazards I have put them through. The lenses are great and easy to clean. The frame is comfortable enough to wear all day and fit well. I have recommended these to friends as they are a great pair of sunglasses for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan T Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Above average
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses would be outstanding if they were a cheaper price. As is, I would call them average.
customer_reviews.author: KKD

customer_reviews.title: Winning Fit
customer_reviews.text: These glasses fit perfectly with the wrap around plastic arms and they are so lightweight that you are not even aware that they are on. Me and my opthalmologist will be happy that they are so easy wearing that I have no problem putting them on when out in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: M. Connors

customer_reviews.title: OK sunglasses for the price!
customer_reviews.text: for a cheap pair these are ok but they don't do a good job of filtering UVA or UVB. I had been using these sunglasses for several years and had problems with my eyes being fatigued. I shared these with my wife and she complained and let me use her own. The comparison was amazing. Then I bought a test kit and found these don't block UVA UVB if any, it is very low protection.
customer_reviews.author: digitalbeachbum

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sunglasses.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite daily glasses. They take a beating, look good, have a very good price, and the fit is terrific. Most importantly, they work, and with no apparent distortions of view. I bought a pair for my boat and one for my pickup.
customer_reviews.author: NH Jeff

customer_reviews.title: ... was paying extra money that these glasses maybe a better quality. They are the same as any $10 ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought since I was paying extra money that these glasses maybe a better quality. They are the same as any $10 glasses you can get on any site. Oh but they did come with a nice little scratch right under the logo.
customer_reviews.author: J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: well this sun glass has that v shape look when you where it. Of course when i say v i'm exaggerating but I personally don't like that kind of look. I wish there were more images to this product so I could see how it would look like but oh well. It can get scratched pretty easily too.. I already scratched it when it was in my pocket.. sad..
customer_reviews.author: bla

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I love these they are lightweight and provide wrap around coverage that I like. Unfortunately, the rubber nose piece and the rubber on the earpiece do not last very long making them uncomfortable..
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A Murphey

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good product, but not the best i've seen
customer_reviews.text: I give these glasses a three star rating and not a five only because the construction seems a bit flimsy and cheap. However, they did arrive in just 4 days, they are lightweight, and the lenses have the right amount of blue tint. Overall, they are nice shades that will serve their purpose. But like I said, the material is slightly flimsy and could have been better.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny Appleseed

customer_reviews.title: Fit great. Look great.
customer_reviews.text: At first try, they were too tight. I thought they were going to give me a headache. I'm not big, but I am over 6' tall (no idea what my head size is). I wore them anyways. At the end of the day I realized they were on all day without me even noticing (beside the initial thoughts) They are very light weight but do not float in water (they sink very slowly) so be careful around pools, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Roberts Jr

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: It has been a week, so I don't know how well they will hold up. I bought these, because I thought the lens were amber. It was the Revo coating that made it look that way. I bought the to wear on overcast days, so I will have to wait to see, if they work for me. They are very light, and the frame is springy. It feels like I could snap the frame in two. We will see. The only issue I have at this moment, is the bottom edge of the lens touches my cheek.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Best Sunglasses for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased approximately six pair of sunglasses, mostly JM01's. They are far superior to your Wal-Mart/gas station variety, and they don't cost an arm and a leg. The nose piece is made of soft rubber and will eventually wear out - but that doesn't stop me from reordering them. Very pleased with this product and will likely continue reordering them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Green

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Good Product for the money. They are very light weight, they do not slip around due to firm pressure on the bows behind your ears. Undistorted clear view of the world. Greatly reduced glare and eye strain on bright sunny days out on the water. I'm keeping them on the boat and will likely buy another pair to keep in the truck.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ullrich

customer_reviews.title: Great look and fit
customer_reviews.text: The unbreakable part will definitely be put to the test with my boyfriend. He is super hard on sunglasses. These seem to be well made and fit snuggly around his head. Perhaps now he will stop trying to take my fishing glasses! Lol. Thanks to all the folks at Amazon for making this a great Xmas! I really hate to shop, but I have completely enjoyed my first online shopping experience with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these Sunglasses, I use them on my motorcycle. They fit great and I don't have to worry about them blowing off. I recently compared the optical quality to a pair of Oakley's that I have, the clarity might have been just a titch better with the Oakley's, but not by much. For the price, you can't go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: T. Dog

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable value.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. One blue and one silver with copper reflective lenses. Very comfortable. They fit around my face perfectly without touching my cheeks. The silicon nose bridge like a larger pad than notmal glasses so there is less pressure on your nose. I will likely get a couple of more because I think they are good value.
customer_reviews.author: MMP1171

customer_reviews.title: Decent price and they help me get to work safely and on time. I like these a lot!
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses work great. I use them when I am driving to work. Prior to buying these, I used to squint a lot and realized that I was getting headaches from all of the squinting. Now, I can relax and drive. I know these are cheapos but, for me they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Woodson

product_meta.title: JiMarti JM01 Sunglasses for Golf, Fishing, Cycling-Unbreakable-TR90 Frame
product_meta.description: Our Customers are telling us these are the most comfortable glasses they have ever worn. The Super light TR90 frame and lens only weighs .60 ounce. You can hardly feel them on your face, yet they are Unbreakable! TR90 Memory Frame for the most comfortable fit available today in addition to unparalleled durability. Great Fashion Frame Rimless design for Golf, Cycling, Running, Fishing and all Active Outdoor lifestyles. 100% UV protection lens. The fit is so pure, it is almost like you are not wearing anything!
feature_bullets: Unbreakable, Bendable, Super light weight TR90 memory Frame
Active fit for active people. Soft Rubber Nose & ear Pieces for all day comfort
Lifetime Breakage Warranty on Frame and Lens
